content.question: Which of the following will result in an increase in labor demand?

choices.label: An increase in the wage rate
An increase in the productivity of labor
A decrease in the price of the product that labor is used to produce
A decrease in the wage rate
A decrease in the demand for the product produced by labor

content.answer: An increase in the productivity of labor

topic.text: 5.2: Changes in Factor Demand and Factor Supply

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
